name: vspacecode
description: Spacemacs like keybindings for Visual Studio Code

commands.title: VSpaceCode: Configure Default Settings and Keybindings

vspacecode.magitRefBindings.markdownDescription: The bindings of magit ref menu

bindings.name: Show all buffers in active window
Show active file in tree/explorer view
Copy path of active file with line and column
Copy relative path of active file with line and column
Copy directory path of the active file
Copy relative directory path of the active file
Copy path of active file with line
Copy relative path of active file with line
Copy filename without extension of active file
Copy relative path of active file
Toggle test coverage in current package
Search all references in side bar
Fuzzy search with selection in current buffer
Maximize window and hide side bar

vspacecode.bindingOverrides.markdownDescription: Overrides bindings of the (default) space key

scripts.pretest: npm run test-compile && npm run lint
